channel.title: Comments for page "Perfect Girl Evolution: Loli Loli"
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Perfect Girl Evolution: Loli Loli"

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: When u are at party room at party house and know this jutsu, u can click in lower part of the page to use this, spending a bit of stam for double bonuses of ranking and friend points. This looks like using Naddeshiko's jutsu to collect at village, or Jiraja's (J-Diddy) jutsu to kill Kaiju faster. :)

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: how exactly does one use a jutsu in the party house?
